section.simpara: in Asterisk 1.4 - Asterisk 1.2 users see QUEUEAGENTCOUNT()
section.para: Returns the number of agents (and/or members, which may be devices rather than logged-in users) in the specified queue.; Number of members in "supportqueue": exten => 123,1,Set(foo=${QUEUE_MEMBER_COUNT(supportqueue)})

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'QUEUE_MEMBER_COUNT' =-
[Syntax] QUEUE_MEMBER_COUNT(<queuename>)
[Synopsis] Count number of members answering a queue
[Description] Returns the number of members currently associated with the specified queue.

formalpara.title: diff output to internal help in Asterisk 1.2:
